app.title: ZARA
app.description:
Discover the Zara collection with ideas for Woman, Man, and Kids. You can shop and see all our new collections and fashion campaigns for the upcoming seasons on our app and online store. 


Woman: 
You will find the following categories of clothing and accessories available for women at Zara: 
-	Shirts 
-	T-shirt/Bodysuits
-	Tops
-	Sweatshirts
-	Skirts
-	Pants
-	Jeans
-	Shorts
-	Coats
-	Shoes
-	Bags
-	Swimwear
-	Accessories
-	Lingerie
-	Beauty
-	Fragrances 
-	Basics
-	Complete Looks
-	Suits


Man:
The Zara collection for men includes: 
-	Basics
-	Pants
-	Cargo/Parachute 
-	Jeans
-	Jackets/Overshirts
-	Sweatshirts
-	T-shirts
-	Shirts
-	Polos
-	Shorts
-	Sweaters/Cardigans
-	Suits
-	Overcoats
-	Sportcoats/Blazers
-	Shoes
-	Bags/Backpacks
-	Accessories
-	Fragrances 


Kids:
A selection of clothing, accessories, and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6-14 years
-	Boy: 6-14 years
-	Baby Girl: 9 months-6 years
-	Baby Boy: 9 months-6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months

The Zara collection for kids also includes an Edited/customizable section, a selection of clothing and accessories to customize that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, you can find all of our special releases, our beauty category, and our line of lingerie in the Zara app. 

Other features of the Zara app are:  
-	Favorites: use your favorites list to save all the clothing and accessories that you like.
-	Order tracking and easy, intuitive, and fast returns. Track your order every step of the way. 
-	Locate the Zara store nearest you. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, releases, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use the app in ‚Äústore mode‚Äù when you are shopping in one of our stores and utilize all of its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR code in the Zara app to: 
-	Have all your online and in-store purchases linked. Identify yourself at the register in the store with your Zara QR and ask for the eReceipt.
-	Make returns in the store, online as well as in-store purchases.
-	Pick up all your online orders in the store.

reviews.author: ACC868686
reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.content: Overall, this app is terrible. There‚Äôs not even an option for users to leave reviews‚Äîwhich says a lot. It‚Äôs clunky, confusing, and misleading. I placed a large order, and the app showed shipping options, only for me to receive an email afterward with completely incorrect details. Definitely not user-friendly. I‚Äôll never order online through this app again.

reviews.author: Yonattt
reviews.title: Mostly love
reviews.content:
I really love Zara and the different options available for many different styles. The only thing I wish they had our reviews. 
Reviews are always so helpful and always help I‚Äôm getting something or not.. so far I‚Äôve had luck with sizing and fitting with everything I have purchased. I‚Äôve also learned that if you like something you better get it because there‚Äôs not an option for a waiting list. All in all I always enjoy browsing and shopping at Zara.

reviews.author: Rooneyj.
reviews.title: Unresponsive + faulty barcode scanner
reviews.content: The barcode scanner/QR code scanner/manual look up does not work. I have tried it on various Zara items that I own and it never works. It didn‚Äôt work on my last phone and it doesn‚Äôt work on my new phone. I have an iPhone 16 Pro Max and the app is up-to-date. The scanner never works, and neither does manually entering the barcode numbers. Additionally, the app is continuously, unresponsive, and glitches/freezes.

reviews.author: Janie lee420
reviews.title: Worst website getting refunds
reviews.content: As someone who has placed a lot of online orders, I‚Äôve rarely ever had issues with deliveries or refunds. However, I‚Äôve never experienced a company causing this much trouble until now. On the delivery date, the driver didn‚Äôt deliver the package‚Äîmaybe because they were too busy‚Äîand after that, I received no follow-up communication. It wasn‚Äôt until I reached out to Zara myself that they said they would resend the order. Now it‚Äôs been almost a month, and despite calling multiple times, they said they are processing the refund due to their mistake and telling me to wait 24 to 48 hours, but never received a refund . I will never order again from a company that fails to issue refunds and takes people‚Äôs money like this.

reviews.author: Great fast app
reviews.title: Order Delay
reviews.content: I ordered 3 dresses in June and still haven‚Äôt received them. When I asked about them on the online chat, the AI bot says they don‚Äôt have a pending order from me when I clearly see the order right in my app. I also checked my emails and it was never canceled. It just says preparing but hasn‚Äôt been given to the courier yet. What is the delay? I had to reorder one of the dresses but the other 2 are out of stock! I hope I get my reorder. This is the 2nd time I‚Äôve placed an order here and they didn‚Äôt deliver. The first time they just cancels it out of the blue!

reviews.title: Website Review
reviews.content: Your website is not user friendly at all. Today is my first time shopping online with you and probably the last. Please online shopping has passed 20th century. Your website is still in 20th century mode. Make adjustments please. Your shoppers shouldn‚Äôt be forced to register before check out. No one has time to add all those on any website anymore. The payment method fills out everything these days. Let customers have options of checking out as a guest.

reviews.author: qatar2021palestine
reviews.title: Worst Shopping Experience
reviews.content: I have to say this is the worst shopping app I have ever used. Four years ago, I placed an order and paid for it, but later I was contacted and told that the item was no longer available. I asked them to refund my money, and until today, I haven‚Äôt received anything back. I contacted the store itself and also reached out to them online, but there has been absolutely no response from their side.

reviews.author: IHG #1 FAN
reviews.title: NEVER DISAPPOINTED!
reviews.content: If you‚Äôre not shopping ZARA what are you doing?

reviews.author: kixzqw
reviews.title: Terrible system ‚Äî customers left in the dark
reviews.content:
Deleting the app. Zara‚Äôs in-store pickup system is seriously flawed. The app and emails told me my order was ‚Äúready for pickup,‚Äù but when I went to the store, staff told me it was actually still in transit. A few days later, I got another notification saying it was ready ‚Äî I went again, and this time they said the package was lost.

How is it possible that the store can see the real status (in transit or lost), but the app still tells me it‚Äôs ready? This disconnect is unacceptable. I wasted over two hours and money for these two failed pickup attempts.

Zara needs to fix their broken experience design and fix this system before more people get burned.
